title: Sound of the Rockies debut album (2002) FLAC
description:
Sound of the Rockies debut album (2002)

FLAC lossless CD rip.

This men&#039;s barbershop chorus has a high musical standard set by their directors. They can ring the chords on David Wright&#039;s arrangement of "Waiting for the Robert E. Lee," as well as blend the lush harmonies of Biebl&#039;s "Ave Maria." They have lots of fun on "The Pirate Song" and The Music Man&#039;s "Ya&#039; Got Trouble," veer towards contemporary a cappella on poignant "Bring Him Home," and close with timely patriotism on "America the Beautiful," "Armed Forces Medley" and "Star Spangled Banner." A terrific debut recording! (43:16 2002)

Sound of the Rockies Chorus: Sound of the Rockies (CD)
Song List:

Brother, Can You Spare a Dime?
